mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDLIKE ( SEQ, MEMBER_ID, reg_date ) VALUE ( #{seq}, #{memberId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET FAVORITE = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDLIKE WHERE seq=#{seq} ) WHERE seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDLIKE WHERE seq=#{seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDLIKE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{likeId}

SELECT AA.*, BB.REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT A.SEQ AS seq, A.TITLE AS title, A.CATEGORY AS category, A.MAXNUM AS maxNum, A.PRICE AS price, B.FILENO AS fileno, CONCAT('/upload/', B.FILENAME) AS filename, B.UPLOADPATH AS uploadpath FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACH B ON A.SEQ = B.SEQ AND B.FILENO = 1 WHERE A.SEQ IN ( SELECT C.SEQ FROM BOARDLIKE AS C WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{likeId} ) ) AA LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARDLIKE BB ON AA.SEQ = BB.SEQ AND BB.MEMBER_ID = #{likeId} ORDER BY BB.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT #{criteria.amount} OFFSET #{criteria.startNum}
